price: Wakasema: Sisi ni wenye nguvu na wakali kwa vita; na amri iko kwako, basi tazama ni nini unaamrisha.
arabic: قَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أُوْلُواْ قُوَّةٖ وَأُوْلُواْ بَأۡسٖ شَدِيدٖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ إِلَيۡكِ فَٱنظُرِي مَاذَا تَأۡمُرِينَ
footnotes: Wakamwambia nao wametua: Sisi ni watu wenye nguvu za mwili, na tuna moyo na mashujaa. Hatuogopi vita. Basi angalia wewe jambo unalo taka kutuamrisha nasi ni wenye kut'ii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū naḥnu ulū quwwatin wa-ulū basin shadīdin wal-amru ilayki fa-unẓurī mādhā tamurīna
